DOC.detailed_description: This Comparative evaluation therapeutic efficacy safety use drug Ketorolac tromethamine gel drug Ketoprofen gel , agent local symptomatic therapy patient diseases musculoskeletal system associate pain syndrome outpatient condition . The study include patient moderate pain syndrome gonarthrosis lower back pain ( LBP ) . The sample size 240 calculate main efficacy variable - mean pain intensity accord visual analogue scale ( VAS ) 10 day therapy . Patients subject inclusion study sign informed consent distribute study group depend establish diagnosis : Gonarthrosis group LBP group .
DOC.criteria: General inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients sexes age group 20 70 year , sign informed consent participation study . 2 . Understanding spoken write communication , adequate able follow procedure Protocol fill document relate study . 3 . For woman : patient pregnant , breastfeed . The female patient must either postclimacteric period surgically sterile , entire period study use contraceptive method reliability level high 90 % . Methods contraception high 90 % level reliability common use include cervical cap spermicide , diaphragms spermicide , condom , oral contraceptive . Criteria inclusion group `` gonarthrosis '' : 1 . Patients sexes age group 40 70 year . 2 . Roentgenologically confirm gonarthrosis ( presence roentgenological symptom osteophytes stenosis joint space ) . 3 . Intensity pain knee joint per visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , still : ≥40 mm , movement : ≥ 50 mm . 4 . Presence one mention combination criterion : 1 . Pain knee joint last one month , accompany crepitation active movement joint , morning stiffness 30 min , age 38 year old . 2 . Pain knee joint last one month , accompany crepitation active movement joint , morning stiffness 30 min. , bone enlargement joint area . 3 . Patients sexes age group 20 65 year acute pain syndrome low part back ( less 12 week ) . 6 . Intensity pain back per VAS still ≥40 mm , movement ≥ 50 mm . 1 .
